function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate indoor air quality","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and infections","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Advanced air purification systems, smart HVAC systems","People":"Residents, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"},{"Description":"Poor noise insulation","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Installation of soundproofing materials and double-glazed windows","Technologies":"Noise-canceling systems, acoustic panels","People":"Residents, particularly those sensitive to noise","Owner":"Property owners, building developers"}]}
